title: Jason La Canfora on Eagles, Steelers, Browns training camp news, rumors (Football 07/31)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by CBS Sports NFL Insider Jason La Canfora as he blitzes his way through the rust belt, checking out training camps for the Eagles, Steelers and Browns. JLC breaks down whether Ben Roethlisberger might be angling to get paid, what the skinny on Carson Wentz is with the Eagles and if we should be buying what Cleveland is selling. Will also runs down the latest news and notes around the league.
